title: Welcome back, Norman
creator_credit: Shevard Goldstein, Sharon Burke, Mt Lemmon Production and Film Communications
brief_description: The comical character, Norman Krasner, is presented once again in this sequel of “Norman Krasner”. As a character who can turn common misfortune into near disaster, Norman depicts the weary businessman returning from a business trip. The setting is a busy airport’s parking lot. Norman turns the simple experience of getting out of the parking lot into a hilarious example of “Murphy’s Law”. Cast: Doug MacIntosh.
